tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_consent (
    customer_id INT,
    consent_id INT,
    consent_date DATE,
    PRIMARY KEY (customer_id, consent_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (consent_id) REFERENCES consent_types(consent_id)
);

CREATE TABLE consent_history (
    history_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    consent_date DATE,
    action VARCHAR(50),
    action_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE consent_history (
  consent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT NOT NULL,
  consent_date DATE NOT NULL,
  consent_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  CONSTRAINT fk_customer_consent FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customer_consent(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE consent_removal (
  removal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT NOT NULL,
  removal_date DATE NOT NULL,
  removal_reason VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  CONSTRAINT fk_customer_consent FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customer_consent(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE consent_audit (
  audit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  consent_id INT NOT NULL,
  action_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  audit_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  CONSTRAINT fk_consent_history FOREIGN KEY (consent_id) REFERENCES consent_history(consent_id)
);
